author: xtqqczze
body:
Fixes https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/14295. Also addresses StyleCop CI errors.

Combination of commits from #14293 and #14296, to check if tests pass.

comments.author: rjmholt
comments.body: I'm going to merge this PR and close the other two, since that will make managing the commit easier if we need to cherry-pick it

title: Fix StyleCop and MarkdownLint CI failures
